column1: Changes made: Added ElastiCache to provide secure, blazing fast performance; Increased the storage amount of web servers; Increased the Basic Checks amount of Route 53; Increased the specs of Application Load Balancer, NAT; Added S3 Infrequent Access storage and S3 Glacier storage.

* AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
